title: How to Get Din's Fire on Zelda: Ocarina of Time

steps.title: Acquire the Bomb Bag from Dodongo's Cavern, if you haven't done so already.
steps.content: Acquire the Bomb Bag from Dodongo's Cavern, if you haven't done so already.

steps.title: Travel to the Market and go forward going towards the castle area.
steps.content: Travel to the Market and go forward going towards the castle area.

steps.title: Where that girl was standing earlier in the game, there should be some vines.
steps.content: Where that girl was standing earlier in the game, there should be some vines. Climb up them and jump over the guarded gate.

steps.title: Ahead of you, there is a "Dead end" sign and further down that dead end is a boulder.
steps.content: Ahead of you, there is a "Dead end" sign and further down that dead end is a boulder. Blow it up by placing a bomb next to it.

steps.title: Proceed into the tunnel and you'll come to a Fairy Fountain.
steps.content: Proceed into the tunnel and you'll come to a Fairy Fountain.

steps.title: Step up to the pedestal and play on your Ocarina "Zelda's Lullaby".
steps.content: Step up to the pedestal and play on your Ocarina "Zelda's Lullaby".

steps.title: The fairy will appear and grant you Din's Fire.
steps.content: The fairy will appear and grant you Din's Fire.
